short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Load a Whaly report each time that you open a new tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension enable you to load a Whaly report each time that you open a new tab.

This let you stay on top of your metrics by having them displayed multiple time per day.
